scripts.copy: cp -r src/css/ build && cp src/index.html build
scripts.bundle: browserify src/js/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] | uglifyjs -cm > build/app.js
scripts.watch: watchify src/js/app.js -o build/app.js -d -v -p [ browserify-livereload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 1340 ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run bundle && npm run copy
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run copy && run-p watch static
